issue.description: product_view_definition is used as the product_view_definition for product_as_individual. So should either not constrain product_view_definition to be abstract or should make explicit sub types of product_view_definition for product_as_individual. e.g. product_as_individual_definition

The only available type of relationship for Product seems to be Alternate_product_relationship. Other types of product relationships need to be represented as well. A general Product_relationship seems to be missing. There is nothing like this on the subtypes either (e.g., there are no Breakdown_relationship and Part_relationship).

comment.description: We have product_group for grouping products together. This gets brought in ap239_work_definition. Do you require something more explicit? There is a module Product_relationship - I have not however brought it in to ap239_prdi - perhaps I should.

issue.description: Delete the final sentence from the definition of product operational information in the Introduction ( i.e. delete: "Product operational information also includes field data that can be fed back into the product design/improvement and the configuration status accounting processes.")
1. Amend figure 1 to delete the bubble "feedback".

3. Amend 3.20.4 to read 3.20.4 product operational information the procedures and technical information derived from the product definition information for use by operators and support personnel in the operation, maintenance and disposal of the product NOTE Product operational information includes operating procedures, security procedures, maintenance procedures, spare parts lists, and disposal methods which, like the product definition information, are subject to configuration change management.

The module should USE FROM the condition_characterized module. This will enable conditional effectivity. The condition_item select should be extended to include: Product_definition_element_relationship View_definition_relationship Document_assignment
The condition_parameter_item should be extended to include: Product_definition_element_relationship View_definition_relationship Product, Product_version, Product_view_definition, Product_concept.

description.p: The module use from Ap239_part_definition_information which uses from condition_characterized module.
The condition_item select has been extended with Document_assignment in Ap239_part_definition_information
The condition_parameter_item has been extended with Product, Product_version, Product_view_definition, Product_concept, in Ap239_part_definition_information

issue.description: USE FROM Product_class and Specification_based_configuration to enable AP214 style option based configuration

comment.description: The modules Product_class and Specification_based_configuration are not yet balloted. Once they are a SEDS will be raised against Ap239_product_definition_information_arm.

issue.description: The select effectivity_item should contain: Approval_assignment This is needed to represent a concession. I.e allow the validity of a concession to be bounded by a start and end date.

comment.description: Approval_assignment added to effectivity_item select in ap239_part_definition_information.

issue.description: The select condition_item should contain: Approval, Approval_assignment This is needed to represent a concession.

comment.description: This has been done in the ap239_part_definition_information module.

issue.description: The select condition_evaluation_item should contain: Approval, Approval_assignment This is needed to represent a concession.

comment.description: The module uses from Ap239_part_definition_information. Approval, Approval_assignment have been added to condition_evaluation_item in Ap239_part_definition_information

issue.description: Address_assignment Certification_assignment Contract_assignment Document, Document_assignment, Document_definition, Document_definition_relationship, Document_location_identification, Document_version, File, File_relationship, Identification_assignment, Interface_connection, Interface_connector_design_to_planned, Interface_connector_design_to_realized, Interface_connector_planned_to_realized, Part, Part_version, Part_view_definition, Product_as_individual, Product_design_to_individual, Product_planned_to_realized, Product_version_relationship, Project_assignment, Requirement, Requirement_assignment, Requirement_collection_relationship, Requirement_source, Requirement_version, Requirement_version_relationship, Requirement_view_definition, Security_classification_assignment, are now added to the effectivity_item select in ap239_part_definition_information.
Norwegian pilot: Product_in_slot needs to be a valid select item for Date_or_date_time_assignment.items
Condition_assignment should be extended to include amongst other things; Breakdown_realization

comment.description: Added the super type Product_definition_element_relationship (See RBN-9)

issue.description: It should be possible to assign state_definition and state_observed to a breakdown_element_definition
Module should use from justification and justify product_definition_relationship

comment.description: The arm entity View_definition_relationship has been added to the justification_item select in Ap239_part_definition_information_arm

issue.description: The select state_of_item has been removed from the IR state_observed_schema, renamed to state_observed_of_item and added to State_observed_mim. This requires a change to the MIM and the mapping of this module.
